PricingAdjBatchJob.name: PricingAdjBatchJob
PricingAdjBatchJob.description: Represents the collective update of multiple records on their prices and other adjustments.

EffectiveFrom.description: The date and time when the updated value can be considered for a pricing adjustment batch job.

EffectiveTo.description: The date and time until when the updated value is effective and can be considered for a pricing adjustment batch job.

LastReferencedDate.description: Indicates whether the pricing adjustment batch job has been archived (true) or not (false). This field is read-only.

LastTriggeredDate.description: The date and time when the pricing adjustment batch job was last triggered.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the pricing adjustment batch job.

OwnerId.description: The Salesforce ID of the sales representative who owns the pricing procedure resolution.

ProcessedRecordsCount.description: The total number of records that were successfully updated.

RecordCount.description: The total number of records that have been processed.

RecordList.description: The list of record IDs eligible for a pricing adjustment batch job.

Status.description: The processing status of the pricing adjustment batch job.

TargetObject.description: The target object of the pricing adjustment batch job.

UpdateType.description: The type of update being made by the pricing adjustment batch job.

UpdateValue.description: The numerical value of the update.
